template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a autonomous delivery fleet that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

messages.content: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a autonomous delivery fleet that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Analyze real-time delivery fleet data to optimize vehicle parameters within safety guidelines, track operational results continuously, and report performance improvements to stakeholders.
message.reasoning:
The user wants a single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for an autonomous delivery fleet. The requirements are:

1. Must be a single sentence
2. Plain English (no jargon or technical terms unless explained)
3. Must include these elements:
   - Analyzing live data
   - Adjusting parameters within safety constraints
   - Monitoring results
   - Reporting performance improvements
4. Output only the prompt text (no extra formatting, no quotes unless part of the prompt)
5. Under 40 words

Let me draft a few options:

Option 1: Analyze live delivery data to adjust fleet routing parameters within safety limits while monitoring real-time results and reporting performance improvements to stakeholders. (19 words)

Option 2: Continuously analyze live traffic and vehicle data to optimize delivery routes within safety constraints, monitor outcome metrics, and report efficiency gains to management. (21 words)

Option 3: Review real-time fleet data to calibrate delivery parameters safely, track operational outcomes, and document performance improvements for the autonomous vehicle network. (18 words)

Option 4: Monitor live autonomous vehicle data to adjust operational settings within safety protocols, observe delivery outcomes, and communicate efficiency improvements to the team. (19 words)

Option 5: Analyze real-time delivery fleet data to optimize vehicle parameters within safety guidelines, track results continuously, and report performance gains to stakeholders. (18 words)

All fit the criteria. Option 5 seems clean and covers all bases. Let me check word count: 
Analyze(1) real-time(2) delivery(3) fleet(4) data(5) to(6) optimize(7) vehicle(8) parameters(9) within(10) safety(11) guidelines,(12) track(13) results(14) continuously,(15) and(16) report(17) performance(18) gains(19) to(20) stakeholders.(21)

21 words - well under 40.

Does it include all required elements?
- Analyzing live data? Yes ("Analyze real-time...data")
- Adjusting parameters within safety constraints? Yes ("optimize vehicle parameters within safety guidelines")
- Monitoring results? Yes ("track results continuously")
- Reporting performance improvements? Yes ("report performance gains")

All good. Single sentence? Yes. Plain English? Yes. Under 40 words? Yes.

I'll go with this one.
